subject: Football
Ratings and Rating Systems
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Auburn’s top-ranked football team dropped from No. 4 to No. 85 in the N.C.A.A.’s Academic Progress Report, and critics saw that as a sign of progress.
snippet: Auburn’s top-ranked football team dropped from No. 4 to No. 85 in the N.C.A.A.’s Academic Progress Report, and critics saw that as a sign of progress.
